div.p: This code system http://www.cms.gov/place-of-service defines many codes, but they are not represented here

description.value: Place of Service codes are placed on health care professional claims to indicate the setting in which a service was provided

copyright.value: https://www.cms.gov/Medicare/Coding/place-of-service-codes/Place_of_Service_Code_Set.html. The link takes one to the Place of Service list as an html document; it is not a file to which an IG can be bound. The code set is owned by CMS and is available for use.
